name: F1 Pole Position
description: F1 Pole Position, released in Japan as Human Grand Prix (ヒューマングランプリ), is a 1992 racing video game for the SNES, developed by Human Entertainment and published by them in Japan, while the other versions were handled by Ubisoft. It is the first game in the Human Grand Prix/F1 Pole Position series, which features Formula One licensing.
